definition: Moore or Moor (name)/see also 摩爾人|摩尔人[Mo2 er3 ren2]
Moldova/Republic of Moldova, former Soviet republic on the border with Romania

sentences.english: It's going to go to where there's less moles.
sentences.chinese: 我想到摩尔数少一点的地方。

sentences.english: Dr. Raymond and Dorothy Moore are professionals known around the world;
sentences.chinese: 雷蒙德和多萝西摩尔博士是世界知名的教育专家。

sentences.english: A Soviet naval base near Murmansk helped the Nazi attack on Norway.
sentences.chinese: 苏联摩尔曼斯克一处海军基地协助纳粹攻击挪威。

sentences.english: Moldova is a landlocked country located in southeastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 摩尔多瓦是一个欧洲东南部的内陆国家。

sentences.english: That's when Moore makes in a hallucinatory state. (She eats his tuber.
sentences.chinese: 那是摩尔让沼泽异形和艾比奥肯在幻觉状态下野合。

sentences.english: Mousterian hut from Moldova, in the Ukraine.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰摩尔多瓦的莫斯特式棚屋。

sentences.english: And how do we get the value of the mole?
sentences.chinese: 我们是如何得到摩尔的量值？

sentences.english: 'I'm confident the proposal, now before the government, will get the go-ahead, ' said Mr. Moore.
sentences.chinese: “我有信心政府会将这个建议进行下去，”摩尔说。

sentences.english: Which is the mole of black manor forest password box key in?
sentences.chinese: 摩尔庄园黑森林密码箱钥匙在哪？

sentences.english: It is often convenient to use the mole to describe the amount of substance.
sentences.chinese: 用摩尔来表示物质的量通常是很方便的。

sentences.english: The formula of the molar heat capacity of Onnes gas in arbitrary quasi-static process is derived.
sentences.chinese: 导出了昂尼斯气体在任意准静过程中的摩尔热容公式。

sentences.english: But shouldn't he speak with Scudamore?
sentences.chinese: 但他不该和斯库达摩尔谈谈么？

sentences.english: So don't try just one method to learn morse code.
sentences.chinese: 因此不只是试一个方法学习摩尔斯电码。

sentences.english: So, there's 1 mole of calcium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 这儿有1摩尔的碳酸钙产生。

sentences.english: Expression of hydrogen ion concentrationsintermsof molar concentrations is rather cumbersome.
sentences.chinese: 用摩尔浓度表示氢离子浓度是相当麻烦的。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
